title: Compare Articles of Confederation and Constitution

content.question: Unlike the Articles of Confederation, the Constitution does which of the following?

choices.label: Restricts the ability of Congress to tax.
Restricts the ability of Congress to establish an army or navy.
Establishes a unitary form of government.
Emphasizes state sovereignty over national sovereignty.
Emphasizes both national sovereignty and federalism.

content.answer: Emphasizes both national sovereignty and federalism.

topic.text: 1.4: Challenges of the Articles of Confederation

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
